front.title: •Pote Snitkin (V)
front.gametext: While driving a vehicle, adds one battle destiny and your total ability here may not be reduced. At same and related sites, Skrillings are power and forfeit +2, and, once per game, your just-lost transport vehicle may be 'recycled' (place in Used Pile).
front.lore: Skrilling smuggler. Supplied Jabba's henchmen with weapons when he was Hermi Odle's predecessor. An excellent driver.
